title: Hostel not available! PG recommendation
content:
Guys I heard hostel is not available for 1st year students this year is it true
Also please recommend pgs that are near pesu and preferable like only pesu students there

comments.body:
1. Use the right flair. This is not an announcement. 
2. This has been discussed in the past, year after year. Please search the sub, you'll find many recommendations. 
3. You didn't even mention any details like campus or gender. If you want good answers you're going to need to ask good questions.
Theres a pg at backGate name is LikeHome pg ...the only con is Food is not good
